options.description:
A balance mod made by Blood And Pride.
Changes: - All changes made by the Official Upcoming Balance Mod until 27/12/12 - Onos health is reduced to 800 - Onos armor is reduced to 400 - Onos point value is reduced to 26 - Onos gore damage is reduced to 47 - Onos smash damage is reduced to 80 - Exo health is increased to 150 - Marine health is increased to 115 - Marine armor is increased to 60 - Marine point value is changed to 7 - Jetpack health is increased to 140 - Jetpack armor is increased to 60 - Shade health reset to normal (250). - Whip Whack Range had been reduced to 3.5 from 6.5 since the grenade damage range is only 6.
options.title: Blood And Pride Mod
